Class RMIServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.Network.Server.RMIServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Remote
public class RMIServer extends Object implements VirtualServer
RMIServer is the server-side implementation of the VirtualServer interface. It manages client connections, handles user input, and maintains the game state.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws RemoteException
      Main method to start the RMI server. It binds the RMIServer instance to the RMI registry and keeps the server running.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments (not used)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an error during the remote method call

    • handleUserInput

      public void handleUserInput(VirtualClient virtualClient, String input) throws RemoteException
      Handles user input from the VirtualClient. It delegates the input handling to the ServerController.
      Specified by:
      handleUserInput in interface VirtualServer
      Parameters:
      virtualClient - the client that sent the input
      input - the user input
      Throws:
